# GitHub Copilot Instructions

- Before executing any task, produce a plan first in plans/plan-task.md.
- Don't execute a task before getting approval for the plan.
- When executing a task, log key steps taken under .github/logs/logs-YYYY-MM-DD.md. Include not only what worked, but also what didn't. Put emphasis on what didn't work.
- Use these logs as references when editing files under .github/instructions/**.
